text: Mohammad Arafat (born 10 December 1994) is a Bangladeshi cricketer. He made his first-class debut for Rangpur Division in the 2015–16 National Cricket League on 13 April 2017. He made his Twenty20 debut for Prime Doleshwar Sporting Club in the 2018–19 Dhaka Premier Division Twenty20 Cricket League on 25 February 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi cricketers Category:Prime Doleshwar Sporting Club cricketers Category:Rangpur Division cricketers Category:Victoria Sporting Club cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Mohammad Arafat
